markdownRemark.html:
Colors Utilities Classes

In sparkUI we have utilities classes to colorize text, background, fill and stroke of svgs utilities classes formulas are: u-color-[COLOR_NAME] Colors

Class Usage
u-color-[COLOR_NAME] dfs
u-bg-[COLOR_NAME] sdfsdf
u-fill-[COLOR_NAME] sdfsdf
u-stroke-[COLOR_NAME] sdfsdf
